text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
"Champions Meeting"?! 
Suzuka, do you know what this is?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It looks like a new kind of tournament.
You match with opponents in real time
and race for first place.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
So it's a chance to compete with 
racers from all over the world... 
I can't wait to get started!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wow! I'm gettin' excited for it too!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Up to three runners can enter 
the tournament, so we have to get 
chosen for it first.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Also, the tournament is split into 
preliminaries and finals!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh, so we're gonna hafta win 
the prelims first before we're 
allowed to run in the finals!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
All righty! Time to show 'em who's boss! 
Let's train hard and give it our best, 
Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe. You're getting me all excited too.
